S04n484:1: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha utthāya tasmāddharmāsanāt sarvāṃstān bodhisattvāan piṇḍīkṛtya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā ṛddhayabhisaṃskārapariniṣpannena dakṣiṇahasteṣvadhyālambya tasyāṃ velāyāmetadavocat-imāmahaṃ kulaputrā asaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrasamudānītāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ yuṣmākaṃ haste parindāmi anuparindāmi nikṣipāmi upanikṣipāmi |
S04n484:4: dvaitīyakamapi traitīyakamapi bhagavān sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ dakṣiṇena pāṇināadhyālambyaitadavocat-imāmahaṃ kulaputrā asaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrasamudānītāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ yuṣmākaṃ haste parindāmi anuparindāmi nikṣipāmi upanikṣipami |
S04n484:5: yuṣmābhiḥ kulaputra udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā deśayitavyā prakāśayitavyā |
S04n484:7: amātsaryo'haṃ kulaputrā aparigṛhītacitto viśārado buddhajñānasya dātā,
S04n484:11: amatsaribhirbhūtvemaṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanaṃ mahopāyakauśalyamāgatānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ saṃśrāvayitavyaḥ |
S04n484:12: ye ca aśrāddhāḥ sattvāste'smin dharmaparyāye samādāpayitavyāḥ |
S04n484:13: evaṃ yuṣmābhiḥ kulaputrāstathāgatānāṃ pratikāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati ||
S04n484:14: evamuktāste bodhisattva mahāsattva bhagavatā śākyamuninā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena mahatā prītiprāmodyena sphutā abhūvan |
S04n484:15: mahacca gauravamutpādya yena bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato'rhana samyaksaṃbuddhastenāvanatakāyāḥ praṇatakāyāḥ saṃnatakāyāḥ śirāṃsyavanāmya añjaliṃ pragṛhya sarva ekasvaranirghoṣeṇa bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadūcuḥ- tathā bhagavan kariṣyāmo yathā tathāgata ājñāpayati |
S04n484:20: traitīyakamapi sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇa ekasvaranirghoṣeṇa evaṃ bhāṣate sma-alpotsuko bhagavān bhavatu yathāsukhavihārī |
S04n484:21: tathā bhagavan kariṣyāmo yathā tathāgata ājñāpayati |
S04n484:23: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvāṃstāṃstathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānanyebhyo lokadhātubhyaḥ samāgatān visarjayati sma |
S04n484:24: yathāsukhavihāraṃ ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmārocayati sma-yathāsukhaṃ tathāgatā viharantvarhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iti |
S04n484:25: taṃ ca tasya bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya ratnastūpaṃ yathābhūmau sthāpayāmāsa |
S04n484:28: te cāprameyā asaṃkhyeyāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anyalokadhātvāgatā ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu siṃhāsanopaviṣṭāḥ,
S04n484:29: prabhutaratnaśca tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sa ca sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇaḥ,
S04n484:30: te ca viśiṣṭacāritrapramukhā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā bodhisattva mahāsattvā ye pṛthivīvivarebhyo'bhyudgatāḥ,
S04n484:31: te ca mahāśrāvakāḥ tāśca catasraḥ parṣadaḥ,
S04n484:33: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye'nuparīndanāparivarto nāma saptaviṃśatimaḥ samāptaḥ || * * * * * *
S04n484:35: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat |
S04n484:36: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ ||
